com.ephesoft.dcma.tesseract.service

Interface TesseractService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OCRService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TesseractServiceImpl

    public interface TesseractService
extends OCRService
    This service is used to generate HOCR files(html files with HOCR text) from image files. The service reads the image files from batch xml and generates HOCR file for each image file.It also updates the batch xml with the name of newly created HOCR file.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    TesseractServiceImpl

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createOCR(java.lang.String actualFolderLocation, java.lang.String colorSwitch, java.lang.String imageFile, java.lang.String outputFolderLocation, java.lang.String cmdLanguage, java.lang.String tesseractVersion)
      This method generates the HOCR files for image file and generates the output hocr file at the output folder location.
      void generateHOCRFiles(BatchInstanceID batchInstanceID, java.lang.String pluginWorkflow)
      This method generates the HOCR files for each image file read from batch xml and updates the same batch XML with the name of HOCR file.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.ephesoft.dcma.core.service.OCRService

        createOCRforFile, generateHOCRFilesForFolder
